rules_text:
Mutate {G}{U} [i](If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Whenever K'Vulm, Devious Cohort enters or mutates, it connives. If you discard a land card this way, K'Vulm gets +1/+1 until end of turn. [i](To have a creature connive, draw a card, then discard a card. If you discarded a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
